audio_quality.description: Audio quality is poor, with significant background noise and muffled speech.  The signal-to-noise ratio is low, making parts of the response inaudible.

background_noise_impact.description: Excessive background noise makes it difficult to understand the candidate's responses.

confidence.description: Low confidence in transcription due to poor audio quality.

speech_pace.description: Speech pace is too fast and inconsistent, affecting intelligibility.

tone.description: The tone is mostly neutral but difficult to assess accurately because of the low audio quality.

emotional_consistency.description: Difficult to assess emotional consistency due to poor audio and video quality and frequent interruptions.

body_language.description: Body language is partially visible, but not sufficient for reliable assessment due to camera angle and lighting. The candidate is mostly still, with few observable gestures.

eye_contact.description: Eye contact cannot be reliably assessed due to camera angle.

facial_expressions.description: Facial expressions are somewhat visible; however, limited visibility and poor lighting conditions make a detailed analysis challenging.

summary.areas_for_improvement: The candidate needs to improve audio quality significantly to ensure clear communication. A better camera angle showing more of the upper body and face and proper lighting conditions are essential. The candidate also needs to moderate their speech pace and ensure clear pronunciation.
summary.strengths: The candidate attempts to answer all the questions, demonstrating their willingness to participate.

clarity.description: Clarity is low due to speech pace, pronunciation, and poor audio.

coherence.description: Coherence is also affected by poor audio; responses are fragmented and difficult to follow.

completeness.description: Responses to most questions are incomplete because of poor audio and frequent interruptions.

question_3.feedback: Partial response;  details are unclear due to audio problems.

relevance.description: Relevance is difficult to assess accurately due to the incomprehensible nature of the responses.

questions.question_1: Describe your experience with Python libraries used in machine learning (e.g., NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn).
questions.question_2: What machine learning algorithms are you most familiar with, and have you implemented them in Python?
questions.question_3: Describe a time you faced a challenging technical problem while working with Python and AI/ML. How did you overcome it?
questions.question_4: Tell me about a time you had to explain a complex technical concept to a non-technical audience.
questions.question_5: What aspects of working in a fast-paced AI/ML environment appeal to you?
